AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to a trail, up to a limit of 10

CreateTrail.name: CreateTrail
CreateTrail.description:
Grants permission to create a trail that specifies the settings for delivery of log
                                                data to an Amazon S3 bucket

DeleteTrail.name: DeleteTrail
DeleteTrail.description: Grants permission to delete a trail

DescribeTrails.name: DescribeTrails
DescribeTrails.description:
Grants permission to list settings for the trails associated with the current region
                                                for your account

GetEventSelectors.name: GetEventSelectors
GetEventSelectors.description: Grants permission to list settings for event selectors configured for a trail

GetInsightSelectors.name: GetInsightSelectors
GetInsightSelectors.description:
Grants permission to list CloudTrail Insights selectors that are configured for a
                                                trail

GetTrail.name: GetTrail
GetTrail.description: Grants permission to list settings for the trail

GetTrailStatus.name: GetTrailStatus
GetTrailStatus.description:
Grants permission to retrieve a JSON-formatted list of information about the specified
                                                trail

ListPublicKeys.name: ListPublicKeys
ListPublicKeys.description:
Grants permission to list the public keys whose private keys were used to sign trail
                                                digest files within a specified time range

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to list the tags for trails in the current region

ListTrails.name: ListTrails
ListTrails.description: Grants permission to list trails associated with the current region for your account

LookupEvents.name: LookupEvents
LookupEvents.description:
Grants permission to look up API activity events captured by CloudTrail that create,
                                                update, or delete resources in your account

PutEventSelectors.name: PutEventSelectors
PutEventSelectors.description: Grants permission to create and update event selectors for a trail

PutInsightSelectors.name: PutInsightSelectors
PutInsightSelectors.description: Grants permission to create and update CloudTrail Insights selectors for a trail

RemoveTags.name: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a trail

StartLogging.name: StartLogging
StartLogging.description:
Grants permission to start the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for
                                                a trail

StopLogging.name: StopLogging
StopLogging.description:
Grants permission to stop the recording of AWS API calls and log file delivery for
                                                a trail

UpdateTrail.name: UpdateTrail
UpdateTrail.description: Grants permission to update the settings that specify delivery of log files
